title: Available - Furnished
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


The flat is furnished & equipped between the neighbourhood of Gorlitzer park and Schlesisches tor area.
Apartment is just renovated and has view and balcon on courtyard, so very calm.

wifi, hot water, electricity, heating, towels, bedding, dishes, washing machine........... included, no xtra charge.

Non smoking, nor pet.
Visits in the evening upon request.
Rent monthly & 3 months deposit

U-bahn stations :
Gorlitzerbahnoff
Schlesisches tor banhoff
